sources.title: Phantom Killer (1942)
sources.description: Starring Dick Purcell, Joan Woodbury, John Hamilton, Warren Hymer, Mantan Moreland, J. Farrell MacDonald, Gayne Whitman, Kenneth Harlan, George J. Lewis, Karl Hackett, Harry Depp, Isabel La Mal, Robert Carson, Frank Ellis Directed by William Beaudine Writing by Karl Brown, Albert DeMond Produced by A.W. Hackel Music by Frank Sanucci Cinematography by Marcel Le Picard Edited by Jack Ogilvie Production Management - Ben Gutterman Second Unit Director or Assistant DirectorÂ - Richard L'Estrange Sound Department - Glen Glenn Country: USA Language: English Release Date: October 2 1942 Production Companies: Monogram Pictures Distributed by Monogram Pictures (1942) - Motion Pictures for Television (1951) Runtime: 1h 00min 26sec In Black & White Sound Mix: Mono Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Negative Format: 35mm Printed Film Format: 35mm Cinematographic Process: Spherical Genres: Mystery, Crime, Comedy, Horror
